return-response.set-body: { "color_background": "#000000", "color_error": "#9e2d2d", "color_highlight": "#69b5ce", "color_modal_backdrop": "", "color_success": "#498e49", "color_text": "#303030", "dim_border_radius": "6px", "dim_font_size": "13px", "dim_spacing_size": "20px", "font_family_body": "Georgia, Times, 'Times New Roman', serif", "font_family_heading": "'HelveticaNeue-Light', Helvetica, Arial, 'Lucida Grande', sans-serif;" }
